text: Vspomnite, o syny Israila, kogda My skazali vam: "Voydite v etot bol'shoy gorod - Iyerusalim - i pitaytes' tam, gde i kak pozhelayete, v svoyo udovol'stviye. I vkhodite v naznachennyye vashim prorokom vorota, smirenno poklonyayas' i prosya proshcheniya za svoi grekhi. My prostim vashi pregresheniya i vozvelichim delayushchikh dobro
